titleStmt.title: The French kings declaration made in favour of the princes, dukes, peeres, officers of the crown, lords, gentlemen, and others, who had withdrawne themselues from his Majesty. Publisahed in Parliament the twelfth of May, 1617. Translated out of the French copie.
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1610-1643 : Louis XIII)
Louis XIII, King of France, 1601-1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Felix Kyngston for William Arondell, at the Angell in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
